price: (13) Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead[1802] and kept back.[1803]
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
footnotes:
[1802]- i.e., his deeds, which await him in the Hereafter.
[1803]- i.e., that which he did not do or which he delayed.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
